While controlling the body of [[Boruto Uzumaki]], [[Momoshiki]] cloaks himself in an aura of deep blue chakra and flies high into the sky, momentarily vanishing from view. He then arcs back down and dives toward his opponent at high speed while forming a [[Rasengan]] in his right palm, striking them with it at the moment of impact. His glittering blue chakra causes the attack to resemble a falling star.

==Trivia==
* This jutsu originally appeared without a name in the ''[[Boruto: Naruto Next Generations]]'' anime in an extended piece of fight choreography created to heighten the final clash between Momoshiki and [[Kawaki]]; in the original manga, Momoshiki merely springs off the ground and flies straight at Kawaki while preparing his Rasengan.
* The attack was later adapted into a distinct, named jutsu in ''[[Naruto Mobile]]'', with Momoshiki diving straight down to strike his foe.

[[pl:Insei Rasengan]]
